ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Re: Fun on Rodcet Nife
ygData.msgSnippet: Well on Rodcet Nife we are Mystic Alliance Everyone seems to be having a blast. People who have very high level characters on their other servers have been
ygData.messageBody:
Well on Rodcet Nife
we are Mystic Alliance
Everyone seems to be having a blast.
People who have very high level characters on their other servers have been
saying that they haven't had this much fun in a very long time!
Heck, one of my real life straight friends has even made a character on the
server to join in the fun!

hamyrmint
18th Level cleric of Kaladim

----- Original Message -----
From: "Swin Piccaver" <swin@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 24, 2000 1:24 PM
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Re: Fun on Rodcet Nife


> Hi and nice to meet you all!
>
> I have just today subscribed to "EQ_Rainbow" on the recomendation of
> a friend Lora whos been with the list for about a year.
>
> Having recently left Luclin server where me and Lora met each other
> we have started new characters on Terris-Thule. Now we have both
> played EQ for a long while and have had chars on various other
> servers prior to Luclin.... yada yada, I'm babbling.
>
> Anyhow, we have only just started fresh on Terris and Lora mentioned
> that there are people currently moving to Rodcet Nife starting again
> also. This has me curious and we are considering it.
>
> Basically I just wanted the name of the guild there and a contact I
> could get in touch with to have a chat with about it all. I'd
> appreciate someone to show us around so to speak.
>
> I can be reached on swin@... if anyone feels the urge
> to send me some details. =)
>
> Thanks in advance
> Hugs and kisses
> Swin
>
> --- In EQ_rainbow@egroups.com, "David Lari" <kerik@g...> wrote:
> > Not sure if it was mentioned on EQ_Rainbow, but last night we had a
> big
> > Mystic Alliance guild event on Rodcet Nife. It was called MegaPlat
> and
> > consisted of a lottery (the grand prize was 665 plat) and raffles
> of various
> > items (armor, jewelry, weapons, etc.)
> >
> > We had around 20 guild members on at the same time and that set a
> record for
> > us, I believe. A lot of people have been moving over to the Rodcet
> server
> > and this event was a great way for them to get some nice equipment.
> >
> > Joe and Rob did a great job of coordinating and running the event.
> Thanks
> > guys.
> >
> > If anyone else wants to create characters on Rodcet, we invite you
> to come
> > join us. We'll be happy to help you out as you start new
> characters. We're
> > quickly making Rodcet the San Francisco of Norrath and you are
> welcome to
> > join the fun.
> >
> > David
> > Kerik, Wood Elf Druid
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Great brand name shoes at Zappos.com.
> Click Here!
> http://click.egroups.com/1/7060/9/_/560749/_/964463093/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
